content: try a smaller needle size need extra support i ve filmed step-by-step kal videos to guide you through tricky parts of the honey & salt hat you can find them on an ig highlight here 1 *last little thing every pattern i write is the final result of many hours of creation all spent with a lot of care and intention this pattern is shared for free and if you ve enjoyed knitting it or found it helpful you can support my work by buying me a coffee here 2 * 1 https //www instagram com/s/aglnagxpz2h0oje4mdu2mteynjc3ntyymjq0 igsh=mnr2dm51b3eyeg94 2 https //buymeacoffee com/anouskaknits
